name: Pong-Dual
description:
A loacal two player Pong Game made for Multiplayer Game Jam 2022, currently it's only built for PC.

Please download all the files for running the game.

Goal : Player's goal will be to score 5 points before opponent.

Controls : 

Click on Start Game button to start playing the game

for Player_1 - keypad_A to move left, keypad_D to move right

for Player_2 - keypad_J to move left, keypad_L to move right

Click Main menu button to go to Start menu/ main menu

Click Replay button or ctrl+R to reload/replay game
